question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Most CPUs are Keyboards.

No Keyboard is a Mouse.

All Mice are CPUs.



Conclusion:

I. Some Keyboards are CPUs.

II. All CPUs are Mice.

III. No Mouse is a Keyboard.

IV. Some Mice are Keyboards.



Choices:

1- Only I follows

2- Only II and III follow

3- Only I and III follow

4- Only II follows
